name: DRAGON QUEST HEROES™ II
descr:
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/574050/extras/Steam2.2.jpg?t=1579778123[/img]
DRAGON QUEST HEROES II is a hack-and-slash, field-roaming Action RPG that sends players on a new adventure to restore order to a once peaceful world filled with hordes of monsters and battles of epic proportions. Up to 4 players can band together in cooperative multiplayer to conquer swarms of enemies and defeat challenging boss monsters. There is also a cast of many playable characters each with unique moves and abilities – including a host of familiar faces from the DRAGON QUEST® series and four brand new heroes that must team up to defeat an unknown threat looming over the Seven Realms! 

Features
[list][li]Online Multiplayer – Up to 4 players can play online
[/li][li]Transform into a monster and battle as one of them
[/li][li]New world, new story & new adventures
[/li][li]Numerous unique characters each with unique abilities 
[/li][li]Change your vocation and play in any fighting style with a variety of magic & weapons![/li][/list]
detail:
名称: DRAGON QUEST HEROES™ II
类型: 动作, 角色扮演
开发商: Square Enix, KOEI TECMO GAMES CO., LTD.
发行商: Square Enix
系列: DRAGON QUEST
发行日期: 2017 年 4 月 25 日
review: 全部评测: 褒贬不一 (646) - 此游戏的 646 篇用户评测中有 69% 为好评。
全部评测: 褒贬不一 (646 篇中的 69%) 发布至今

Windows
最低配置:
操作系统 *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit required)
处理器: Core i7 870 2.8GHz or better
内存: 4 GB RAM
显卡: NVIDIA GeForce GTS 450 or AMD Radeon HD 5770

存储空间: 需要 30 GB 可用空间

处理器: Core i7 2600 3.4GHz or better
内存: 4 GB RAM
显卡: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 Ti or AMD Radeon HD 7870
DirectX 版本: 11
存储空间: 需要 30 GB 可用空间
*
2024 年 1 月 1 日（PT）起，Steam 客户端将仅支持 Windows 10 及更新版本。
